translation.zh:
‎青少年饮酒非常不好
‎（剧中部分情节来自现实生活）

translation.en: Yo, I got a fake ID though.
translation.zh: ‎哟 不过我有个假身份证

translation.en: -[Zoe] All good things come to an end,
and by good things, I mean, a sick penthouse,
translation.zh: ‎我说的美好事物是一套顶层豪华公寓

translation.en: matching super guards, stupidly hot guys and vodka.
translation.zh: ‎加上超级跑车、性感帅哥和伏特加

translation.en: -Ahh! -[male police officer] Stay where you are!
-[Zoe] Okay, that wasn't me, that's Rebecca. I'm Zoe, I'm over here.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 那不是我
‎那是丽贝卡 我是佐伊 我在这里

translation.en: Yeah, this is as bad as it looks and trust me, it just gets worse.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 这看起来很糟糕
‎相信我 情况只会变得更糟
‎这一切都是真实的 至少大部分是

translation.en: Well, mostly-ish, the names and the places had to change
translation.zh:
‎这一切都是真实的 至少大部分是 ‎-名字、地点有修改是为了保护…
‎-放开我 蠢猪警察！他妈的！

‎-名字、地点有修改是为了保护…
‎-放开我 蠢猪警察！他妈的！

‎-名字、地点有修改是为了保护…
‎-放开我 蠢猪警察！他妈的！ ‎…不那么无辜的人

translation.en: This is the story of how me and my best friend accidentally built and lost one
translation.zh:
‎这是一个关于我和我最好的朋友
‎如何意外建立但又失去了

translation.en: of the largest fake ID empires in North America
translation.zh: ‎北美最大的假身份证帝国之一以及

translation.en: and had everything raided by the feds.
translation.zh: ‎我们被联邦特工突击突击的故事

translation.en: -J, you can't keep doing this. -It's fine. I'll be fine...
translation.zh: ‎杰森 你不能一直这样下去！ ‎没关系 我不会有事的 我…
‎天啊 我得走了 好吧 那么…

‎-那不是你的钱
‎-再见 妹妹！

translation.en: -Fuck! What? -[Becca] Zoe! I need a ride.
translation.zh:
‎-操！什么事？
‎-佐伊 开车来载我！

translation.en: -I've known Rebecca since I was six years old.
translation.zh: ‎我从六岁起就认识丽贝卡了

translation.en: I love her like a sister and once I actually pulled my own tooth out
translation.zh:
‎我像姐姐一样爱她
‎有一次我真的拔了自己的牙

translation.en: so she wouldn't feel self-conscious about losing baby teeth.
translation.zh:
‎这样她就不会因为
‎掉了乳牙而感到难为情

translation.en: Becca, I don't think that I-
♪ I love men That are unavailable ♪
translation.zh: ‎♪ 我爱那些我无法得到的男人！♪

translation.en: -Why are you doing that with your voice? -[giggles] You know what?
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么要用那种声音说话？
‎-什么？

‎-哦 该死
‎-靠边停车！ ‎-停不了！我在路中间
‎-靠边停车！

translation.en: -Oh, well I wasn't invited. -I invited you!
translation.zh: ‎哦 好吧 我没被邀请 ‎我邀请了你！

translation.en: -Yeah, but it's not your house. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎是的 但那不是你的房子 ‎哦 我的天！
‎他们养了史上毛最多的狗

translation.en: They have the fluffiest dog ever.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我的天！
‎他们养了史上毛最多的狗

translation.en: -Yeah, well, maybe next time. -Oh, Clem says hi.
translation.zh: ‎算了 也许下次参加吧 ‎克莱姆向你问好

translation.en: Are you going to go, or...?
-Just give it a minute. -Why? I'm fi--
translation.zh: ‎还是休息一下吧 ‎怎么了？我没事

translation.en: -Wait, where did you find that? -Cup holder.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 你在哪里找到的？
‎-杯托这里

translation.en: Ooh, fake! I lost mine tonight. Who's your guy?
translation.zh:
‎好酷的假证件！今晚我把证件弄丢了
‎谁帮你搞的证件？

translation.en: -Oh. No, no, no. It's not like that.
-It's, uh... a student card that I made.
translation.zh: ‎这是… ‎这是我自己做的学生证 你知道吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. So I can study at the library.
translation.zh: ‎是的 这样我就能在图书馆学习了

translation.en: -That is the most Zoe thing I've ever heard.
translation.zh: ‎这是我听过的关于佐伊的最酷的事情

translation.en: -Zoe seven at most. -Oh, I love you, Zo.
translation.zh: ‎这才发挥佐伊七成功力 ‎哦 我爱你 佐
‎UPC学生证？ ‎哦 天啊 不 笨蛋 是假身份证
‎哦 天啊 不 笨蛋 是假身份证

‎-二、三…
‎-你在干什么？ ‎安静！ ‎数不清了

‎-贝卡 不要
‎-我想可以的 ‎考虑一下吧

‎-就考虑一下 好吗？
‎-好吧 我在开车 好的

translation.en: -Fuck you, bitch! Go ruin someone else's family!
translation.zh: ‎操 贱人！去破坏别人的家庭吧！
‎很好 拿好你的玩具 很好

translation.en: -Are you sure I can take this? -Whatever. That's fine.
translation.zh: ‎你确定我可以收这些钱吗？ ‎随便吧 没关系 拿走吧 没事的
‎随便吧 没关系 拿走吧 没事的

translation.en: -You're up late. -Yeah, just getting a snack.
translation.zh:
‎-你这么晚起来
‎-是的 只是找点零食吃

translation.en: -Once again, and I can't possibly stress this enough,
translation.zh: ‎再强调一次 我怎么强调都不过分

translation.en: the whole thing was her idea.
I really just wanted to see how hard it would be.

translation.zh: ‎别喝酒 佐伊 保持纯洁

translation.en: -Whatever. Look, did you come up last night?
translation.zh:
‎-别担心
‎-随便吧 ‎听着 你昨晚上来了吗？我不记得了
‎听着 你昨晚上来了吗？我不记得了 ‎是的 你这个笨蛋 这个
‎是的 你这个笨蛋 这个

translation.en: -Can you just hold my birdhouse? -I don't want your birdhouse.
translation.zh:
‎-你能帮我拿着鸟屋吗？
‎-我不想要你的鸟屋

translation.en: -Hold my birdhouse. -I don't want your birdhouse.
-I lose mine last night. -Yeah, you told me.
translation.zh:
‎-我的证件昨晚丢了
‎-是的 你告诉过我了

translation.en: -The back is blank. -Yeah, it's just a prototype.
translation.zh:
‎-背面是空白的
‎-这只是个原型
‎等等 ‎这是你做的？ ‎对 你付钱给我了

translation.en: -Shit, I did? How much? -You gave me like $400.
translation.zh:
‎妈的 我有吗？我给了多少钱？ ‎-你给了我400美元
‎-无所谓

translation.en: -Doesn't matter. Zo, you gotta teach me.
translation.zh:
‎-你给了我400美元
‎-无所谓 ‎佐 你得教我！

translation.en: -Can't, I've got math. Math is now.
translation.zh:
‎-不行 我有数学课 现在就上数学课
‎-什么…佐伊！

‎-不行 我有数学课 现在就上数学课
‎-什么…佐伊！ ‎现在我要去上数学课
‎加油 克莱姆 加油 克莱姆！

translation.en: -Good. He's so beautiful. I'm breaking up with him, end of year, but--
translation.zh: ‎很好 他很帅气 我打算年底和他分手

translation.en: So now tell me. Teach me the thing.
translation.zh: ‎现在告诉我 教我做那事吧

‎“那件事情”？ ‎-求你了 佐？
‎-这里？

‎-求你了 佐？
‎-这里？ ‎没门！ ‎没人在乎

translation.en: -I know, but still... -I paid you. Didn't I?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道 但还是不行
‎-我给你钱了 ‎不是吗？

translation.en: -Okay. But I am not an expert.
I am an aspiring amateur, at best.
translation.zh: ‎我充其量是个有抱负的业余爱好者

translation.en: -You made this. You literally created this thing.
translation.zh: ‎这是你制作的 这真的是你创作的

translation.en: -Yeah, but that's not anything that a five-year-old couldn't learn from the Internet.
translation.zh: ‎这个5岁的孩子在网上都可以学得到

translation.en: start by downloading TOR so your tracks are covered.
translation.zh:
‎从下载Tor开始
‎这样你的踪迹就隐藏了

translation.en: Next, you find templates for the IDs.
translation.zh: ‎接下来 你会找到身份证的模版

translation.en: Anything fake ID-related has been banned or taken down,
translation.zh:
‎任何与假身份证
‎相关的东西都被禁止或删除了

translation.en: so novelty is the magic keyword that you need.
translation.zh: ‎所以你需要使用关键词“新奇”

translation.en: After you have the templates, open them in Photoshop.
translation.zh: ‎有了模板后 在Photoshop中打开它们

translation.en: Then it's really as easy as click on the lines,
translation.zh: ‎这就像点击线条、填空一样简单

translation.en: filling in the blanks and dragging
translation.zh: ‎这就像点击线条、填空一样简单 ‎然后拖进你自己喜欢的自拍
‎然后拖进你自己喜欢的自拍

translation.en: -Okay, fine. I was taking notes. -Yeah, well, maybe don't.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我在做笔记 ‎-是的 嗯 还是不要做吧？
‎-为什么？

‎-是的 嗯 还是不要做吧？
‎-为什么？

translation.en: -I don't know, I mean you could just leave
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 ‎我是说如果你愿意的话
‎你会给警察留下书面记录

translation.en: a literal paper trail to the police if you would like.
translation.zh:
‎我是说如果你愿意的话
‎你会给警察留下书面记录

translation.en: It's West Van. We're in high school.
translation.zh: ‎我们在西凡社区 我们是高中生

translation.en: -[Zoe] Okay. So next you'll need an old school printer.
translation.zh: ‎接下来你需要一台老式打印机

translation.en: Most photo printers work, it's the PPI parameters that matter.
translation.zh:
‎大多数照片打印机都能用
‎最重要的是PPI参数

translation.en: -[Becca] You learned all of this last night?
Then you'll need a CR30 PVC tray and blank PVC cards.
translation.zh:
‎然后你需要一个
‎CR30 PVC托盘和空白PVC卡片
‎用来制作我的学生证吗？是的

translation.en: Tray costs less than 20 bucks on Amazon.
translation.zh: ‎托盘在亚马逊上的价格不到20美元

translation.en: PVC cards are on Alibaba for pennies.
Next, it's really as simple as hitting print.
translation.zh: ‎下一步 真的就像点击打印一样简单

translation.en: I totally could have figured that out myself. I thought it was going to be like smart people stuff.
translation.zh:
‎我本来可以想到的
‎我以为是聪明人才能做的事情

translation.en: -Yeah, well that's how I made yours.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我就是这样做了你的证件的

translation.en: -I mean, more or less. -Well, we should make one tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-差不多是这样做的吧
‎-我们今晚就应该做一个

translation.en: You know you're my best friend. Me too?
translation.zh: ‎你是我最好的朋友对吧 佐？

translation.en: -Honestly, I don't know what I do without you sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎有时候我不知道没有你我该怎么办

‎-是的 你可能…
‎-我爱你 佐

‎-加油 克莱姆！
‎-加油 克莱姆！

translation.en: -Wait, is the game over? -I guess so.
-I didn't realize that we were losing so badly.
You and Becca seemed to be having a good time.
-Uh, yeah. We were trying to cheer for you guys...
translation.zh: ‎没错 我们想为你们加油…

translation.en: Hey, Z, you free later, or what?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 佐 你一会儿有空吗？

translation.en: -Uh, yep, I think so. -Do you want to come by mine
translation.zh:
‎-是的 我想是的
‎-你想来我家吗？

translation.en: and work on that project we were talking about?
translation.zh: ‎我们可以继续刚才谈过的那个项目？

translation.en: Fuck. Okay, okay. Yeah, I'm coming, I'm com--
translation.zh: ‎操！好吧 好 我过来了…

translation.en: -I think I just broke the printer.
-They cut five guys at the rose ceremony this week.
translation.zh: ‎他们在本周的玫瑰仪式上淘汰了五人

translation.en: -I'm skipping a bit but it'll make sense later.
translation.zh: ‎我跳过了一点 但可以理解

translation.en: -Actually, I don't really think that I like the back.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我不太喜欢后面这个设计

translation.en: -No, it's... it's fine. -Let me buy it for you.
translation.zh:
‎不 没关系 ‎-我给你买吧
‎-不要

translation.en: -[Tryst] Get out of this store. [imitates gunfire]
-Same old. This is my bestie, Zoe.
translation.zh: ‎老样子 这是我的闺蜜 佐伊
‎好的 我叫崔斯特 名字里带个Y

translation.en: So are you also an aspiring influencer, Zed?
translation.zh: ‎那么你也是有抱负的网红吗 泽德？

‎-闭嘴！
‎-哦 是佐伊 但没关系

translation.en: -but that's totally fine. -Ugh! No. No, it's not fine.
translation.zh:
‎-闭嘴！
‎-哦 是佐伊 但没关系 ‎不！不 这不好

translation.en: with a thousand suns because our name is our identity
translation.zh:
‎我向你道歉一千次 ‎因为我们的名字是我们的身份
‎我们随身携带

translation.en: and we carry it with us but then we give it to others,
translation.zh:
‎因为我们的名字是我们的身份
‎我们随身携带 ‎但后来我们把它给别人

translation.en: so I will not be making that mistake again. Zoe.
translation.zh: ‎所以我不会再犯同样的错误了 佐伊

translation.en: I am not an inspiring influencer, or otherwise--
translation.zh: ‎我不是一个有抱负的网红或什么的

translation.en: -I am actually just trying to get into physics.

translation.zh:
‎-崔斯特 我们有东西要给你
‎-真的吗？
‎嘿！ ‎是我 你在哪里找到的？
‎我们自己制作的！ ‎哦 没错

translation.en: -Do you think you can move them? -Looks pretty good.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你能卖掉它们吗？ ‎看起来不错 你们测试过了吗？
‎看起来不错 你们测试过了吗？

translation.en: -I think I'm just gonna die here.

translation.zh: ‎是啊 该死的圣诞老人巷？

translation.en: -Yeah, but like, the North Pole, like,
if anything Santa Claus would be Canadian.
translation.zh: ‎如果有的话 圣诞老人就是加拿大人

translation.en: -I didn't think they we're gonna read that part.
-Wait, what is the deal with Tryst?
translation.zh: ‎等下 崔斯特是什么情况？

translation.en: -Um, no, I mean, like, like why are you, um...?
translation.zh: ‎不 我是说 你为什么…

translation.en: I'm just exploring options. Don't worry about it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我只是还在选择 别担心 好吗？

translation.en: -Our lockers have literally been beside each other for five years.
translation.zh: ‎我们的储物柜实际上已经相邻五年了

translation.en: So, I heard you're selling fake IDs,
and I'm throwing this party next week...
-[panicked breathing] -[Ken] Nice to meet you, Zoe!

translation.zh: ‎如果我被捕了怎么办？ ‎如果我不能去上学了怎么办？

translation.en: Break a rule for once in your life.
-So, how did you think this would end?
I'd get away and I'd drop the hottest album of the year?
translation.zh: ‎我会免罪 发行今年最热门的专辑？

translation.en: Turns out prison is just prison.
It's not Orange is the New Black.
Although, full disclosure, I actually haven't even seen that show.
translation.zh: ‎尽管坦白说 我完全没看过那个节目

translation.en: Everyone here is so obsessed with it.
translation.zh: ‎这里的每个人都对这部节目着迷

translation.en: I don't know, it's a little meta for me.
translation.zh: ‎但是我觉得那对我来说有点过时了

translation.en: Anyways, it's how I ended up here.
translation.zh: ‎总之 最后我就落到这里来了

translation.en: -Hey, everyone! I'm having the best time.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大家好！ ‎我玩得非常开心…

translation.en: Wait, fuck that. She's full of shit.
translation.zh: ‎等下 他妈的 她胡说八道

translation.en: This is what really happened. First of all, she was the one...
translation.zh: ‎这才是真实发生的事情 首先她是那…
